wikipedia_page.main:
Colin Raymond Jones  (born 21 March 1959 in Gorseinon,  Swansea) is a Welsh former boxer, who became British, Commonwealth and European welterweight champion. Before turning professional he represented Great Britain at the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.
Colin had a trainer by the name of Gareth Bevan, also helped out by his son John Bevan.
